fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- In the night, perch yourself on a player's shoulder. You will learn how many times they were visited tonight, but not who visited them. You will peck all of their visitors.
- In the day, investigate a player to see if you've pecked them. If you have, deal a Basic attack to them, which is processed immediately. You may only use this once a day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Astral, because birds are out of this world.
